title: Octopus energy tariff saves woman £400 on her bills: 'I can now put more into my pension!'
tags: Landlords warned they could be 'forced' to install heat pumps under Ed Miliband's net zero drive;Labour's flagship £150 energy bill promise in doubt as some customers set only to receive £90;'I'm a scientist, these simple changes could cut your energy bill by over £300 for free';The GB News Editorial Charter
